mapper.select: SELECT userNo, name, pwWeb, pwTicketing, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY/MM/DD') birth, email, gender, emailRecivable, tel, phone, u.zipcodeNo, sido, gugun, dong, bunji, addr, userType, isDeleted, delComment, TO_CHAR(moddate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') moddate, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regdate FROM users u, zipcode z WHERE u.zipcodeNo = z.zipcodeNo AND userType = #{userType} AND isDeleted = #{isDeleted}

SELECT userNo, name, pwWeb, pwTicketing, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY/MM/DD') birth, email, gender, emailRecivable, tel, phone, u.zipcodeNo, sido, gugun, dong, bunji, addr, userType, isDeleted, delComment, TO_CHAR(moddate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') moddate, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regdate FROM users u, zipcode z WHERE u.zipcodeNo = z.zipcodeNo AND ${signInWith} = #{logId} AND pwWeb = #{logPw} AND isDeleted = #{isDeleted}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(userNo, name, pwTicketing, email, emailRecivable, phone, userType) VALUES(#{userNo}, #{name}, #{pwTicketing}, #{email}, #{emailRecivable}, #{phone}, #{userType})
INSERT INTO point(userNo, point, pointTot) VALUES(#{userNo}, 0, 0)
